fields.request: Manual QA: Validate local-only ws fallback for charge points
fields.request_details: Use a charger on a trusted LAN to connect over ws:// and confirm the new Allow insecure local websocket flag is enabled automatically. Verify the charger logs include the persistent warning about accepting an insecure websocket connection. Then attempt a ws:// connection from a non-local network (e.g., VPN or by overriding the client IP) and confirm the session is rejected and the log records the remote rejection message.
